structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Clerks, Attorneys And Other Officers Of Judicial Courts

law.text: [ Text of section effective until July 1, 2012. For text effective July 1, 2012, see below.] The clerks of the courts in the several counties, the clerks of the supreme judicial court for Suffolk county and the clerks of the superior court for said county shall each be annually allowed for clerical assistance, to be paid by the commonwealth such amounts as shall be approved by the chief administrative justice of the trial court. Chapter 221: Clerical assistance [ Text of section as amended by 2011, 93, Sec. 104 effective July 1, 2012. See 2011, 93, Sec. 137. For text effective until July 1, 2012, see above.] The clerks of the courts in the several counties, the clerks of the supreme judicial court for Suffolk county and the clerks of the superior court for said county shall each be annually allowed for clerical assistance, to be paid by the commonwealth such amounts as shall be approved by the court administrator of the trial court.
